p: Dromedary (DrPlA 2-IB), porcine (PPPlA 2-IB), and stingray group IB phospholipases (SPLA 2-IB) were purified and prepared as described in our previous works [ 18, 19] and De Haas et al. [ 20], respectively. Dromedary (DrPL), stingray (SPL), and porcine (PPL) lipases were also purified according to protocols optimized in previous works [ 21– 23]. The enzymes β-glucosidase, α-amylase, and XO were purchased from Sigma-Aldrich (St. Louis, MO, USA).
